fulltext:
lebuiduc@gmail.com
0938.564.645
Le Bui Duc
Project Lead
E34 Hoang Quoc Viet, Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam
It's better to make half a product than a half-assed
product!
WORK EXPERIENCE
Project/Product Manager/Senior Mobile Development
Ludiino Ltd
12/2015 – Present
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
SMS Integrity Project at ECOM means focusing on improving farm productivity and product qual-
ity, leading in turn to lower costs and higher incomes. ECOMs goal is for farmers to better coffee,
cocoa, and cotton farming and to provide opportunities for dignified and profitable livelihoods for
generations to come. GolfConnect24 is a cool app that makes everything simple & convenient for
golfers to better enjoy the game. Vidoori is a outsourcing customer that focused on providing
Program Management, IT and Engineering support for Government and commercial clients.
Achievements/Tasks
Lead team Product which in more than 10 developers, designers, BAs and
technicians included local team, distributed team and outsourcing team.
Create Product Road-map and improve user experience in app and website as
well. Work out a detailed planning monitoring implementation with the Global
MIS office to deploy a new application to the Profit Centers in Asia.
Work with existing clients and other members of the team to uncover business
needs and objectives, craft appropriate overall strategies and plans to achieve
clients’ business objectives. Reporting to regional manager
Building, planning and leading teams for applications, mentoring other
programmers and contributing to improved processes and workflow.
Attend application training sessions and start-up events at Costa Rica, US,
Vietnam, Indonesia, China, India, PNG. (Hatch-FAIR, TechInAsia, Web-Submit...)
Contact:Dean Luong - Business Intelligent - thien.luong@ecomtrading.com–
Phuong Nguyen - Product Lead - https://www.behance.net/baobao36
Senior Mobile Development (iOS and Android)
Softfoundry Ltd
06/2013 – 11/2015
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Soft-foundry proudly presents Momeet, your mobile video conference and collaboration solution.
Taking your productivity to the next level and revolutionize the vision of business operations,
market development and maintaining customer relationships. Combining with VMEET ®
Telepresence to delivers face-to-face conference experience with perfect HD quality and
interactions, improving productivity by accelerating decision making.
Achievements/Tasks
Bring out this application to App Store & Google Play, can work independent to
create a mobile application. Keep on research and good ability of self-study
Design and develop XMPP, WebSocket, REST APIs... to support mobile client both
Android and iOS.
Using framework such as XCode SDK, Anddroid SDK, Cocoa Pod, Social SDK, Com-
mand Line, Material Design, AWS, Parse, SNS, Core Data, AddessBook, XMPP,
Socket IO, Fire-base, Google SDK, Facebook SDK...
Contact:Nhat Nguyen * Team Leader - nhat.nguyen@sf.com
iOS Developer
Synova Ltd
07/2012 – 05/2013
Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Mobexo Project as a new payment method, Mobexo is a smartphone’s application that is currently
available on iPhone and android. With Mobexo, you can use your smartphone to do transactions in
seconds without additional reader or terminal required. Mobexo provides money transfer services
for individuals, merchants and corporates.
Achievements/Tasks
Bring out this application to App Store
Develop source code based on design specification document, Do Unit Test, fix
bugs, Research technology, Report directly to PM about new issues.
Contact:Phuc Tran * Team Leader–https://github.com/phuc0302
SKILLS
Leadership TeamWork Analysis
Negotiation Communication
Problem Solving
Time Management
Market Research
Customer Service
Java Objective-C Swift
OTHER PROJECTS
QC VietNam (08/2015 – 12/2017)
Manage outsourcing team, manage and release new
version for Apple Store and Google Play
Contact: Son Le * Director of Lazada VN -
levinhson@gmail.com
Inventory QRcode Tracking
(10/2017 – 01/2018)
The solution should help to record detail info of a unit
such as: source, inbound time, quality, weight, ... and
location. This will help ECOM to manage inventory
better, reduce human error, and increase productivity.
The solution will implement scan stations for all
activities that may change unit location/status/info
Contact: Son Le * Director of Lazada VN -
levinhson@gmail.com
ACHIEVEMENTS
Scholarship
Achieve Scholarship for good students of Van Lang University
in 2009, 2010, 2011, 2012.
Boeing Scholarship
Boeing awarded 10 scholarships in HCM, Vietnam, on (2009,
2010, 2011) to students enrolled in the Software
Engineering and Information Systems programs of the
Software Engineering Group of Vietnam (SEGVietnam).
Carnegie Mellon University Certificate
(09/2008 – 07/2012)
http://strategic.isri.cmu.edu/elearning/val/home (My Student
ID: T088145)
LANGUAGES
English
Vietnamese
INTERESTS
Sustainability
Physics
Video Games
Books Sports Travelling
EDUCATION
Bachelor of Software Engineering
Van Lang University
09/2008 – 07/2012
Ho Chi Minh City

educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
